description: Non Material Amendments to planning permission P2017/2588/S73 dated 12/03/2018 to vary condition 2 (Approved Drawings), and the trigger points of conditions 10 (Wheelchair Accessible Apartments, 11 (Wheelchair Parking), 13 (Solar Photovoltaic Panels), 16 (Rainwater Butts), 17 (SUDS), 18 (Energy Efficiency), 25 (Sound Insulation) , 34 (Refuse/Recycling) and 35 (Cycle Parking).  The amendments involve the conversion of a 1-bed unit to a 2-bed unit and changes to the materials to the communal bin/cycle & caretaker stores to blocks A1, C & H and the alteration of phased trigger points to conditions 10, 11, 13, 16, 17, 18, 25, 34 and 35.
decision_conditions:
The following alternative wording of condition 2 to planning permission P2017/2588/S73 is agreed as a non-material amendment:

Condition 2 (drawing numbers)
CONDITION: The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans: 

Proposed Development - Dover Court - Updated Daylight and Sunlight Study dated 23 March 2016, Letter 15-004PL dated 9 March 2016, 462-PL-500, 462-PL-313 Rev A, 462-PL-314 Rev A, 462-PL-315,
